name: The Complex IV
description:
The Complex IV is a role-playing game based on Dungeons & Dragons. Using a simplified subset of the SRD 5.1 ruleset, the game doesn't use aspects like class, race or gender. Instead, skills are used to determine what your character is good at. Characters can reach god-status at level 20.

Play on your own or with up to 5 other players online. Combine your skills or compete against each other - it's your choice.
